doc:
Anne Ramsey https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Anne_Ramsey 0 Angelina "Anne" Ramsey (March 27, 1929 – August 11, 1988) was an American stage, television, and film actress. She portrayed Mama Fratelli in The Goonies (1985) and Mrs. Lift, mother of Danny DeVito's protagonist, in Throw Momma from the Train (1987). The latter film saw Ramsey nominated for a Golden Globe Award and the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress. Angelina_"_Anne_"_Ramsey ( March_27_,_1929 – August_11_,_1988 ) was an_American_stage , television , and film_actress . She portrayed Mama_Fratelli in The_Goonies_(_1985_)_and_Mrs._Lift , mother of Danny_DeVito 's_protagonist , in Throw_Momma from the_Train_(_1987_) . The_latter_film saw Ramsey nominated for a_Golden_Globe_Award and the_Academy_Award for Best_Supporting_Actress .
